CustomField.formula: CASE( MOD( Start_Date__c - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, (Start_Date__c ) + 10 + FLOOR((10-1)/5)*2, 1, (Start_Date__c ) + 10 + FLOOR((10)/5)*2, 2, (Start_Date__c ) + 10 + FLOOR((10+1)/5)*2, 3, (Start_Date__c ) + 10 + FLOOR((10+2)/5)*2, 4, (Start_Date__c ) + 10 + FLOOR((10+3)/5)*2, 5, (Start_Date__c ) + 10 + CEILING((10)/5)*2, 6, (Start_Date__c ) - IF(10>0,1,0) + 10 + CEILING((10)/5)*2, null)
CustomField.label: Bus Photos Due
